paper_title: On weak solutions of time inhomogeneous Itô's equations with VMO diffusion and Morrey drift
abstract: We prove the existence of weak solutions of Itô's stochastic time dependent equations with irregular diffusion and drift terms of Morrey spaces. Weak uniqueness and some results pertaining to strong solutions are also given.
publication_venue: 34 pages. arXiv admin note: substantial text overlap with arXiv:2206.07871, some assertions are made stronger for later use
